name: Introduction to Web Development
description: Learn the fundamentals of web development, including HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

faculty.name: Dr. Sarah Smith
faculty.description: Dr. Sarah Smith is an experienced web developer with over 10 years of industry experience. She specializes in teaching web development fundamentals to beginners.

blogs.title: Getting Started with Web Development
blogs.content: An introductory blog covering the basics of web development, including HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. It introduces users to the fundamental building blocks of the web and how they come together to create web pages and applications.
blogs.book: HTML and CSS: Design and Build Websites by Jon Duckett

name: Data Science Foundations
description: Explore the world of data science, machine learning, and data analysis techniques.

faculty.name: Prof. John Davis
faculty.description: Prof. John Davis is a renowned data scientist with extensive expertise in machine learning and data analysis. He's passionate about sharing his knowledge and experience with aspiring data scientists.
